data.name: Running Shadow - Reaper Set
data.detailed_description:
- Equipment increases your character’s stats, helps complete levels and assists in fighting powerful opponents.
- Upon purchasing equipment, you will receive a set of three items and 10,000 bonus coins!
- Equipment is available to players level 10+
data.about_the_game:
- Equipment increases your character’s stats, helps complete levels and assists in fighting powerful opponents.
- Upon purchasing equipment, you will receive a set of three items and 10,000 bonus coins!
- Equipment is available to players level 10+
data.short_description:
- Equipment increases your character’s stats, helps complete levels and assists in fighting powerful opponents.
- Upon purchasing equipment, you will receive a set of three items and 10,000 bonus coins!
- Equipment is available to players level 10+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8/7/XP (SP 3)/Vista (SP 2)
  • Processor: Intel Core® 2 Duo 1.6 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 6600GT / AMD ATI Radeon X1200 GTO
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX 9.0 compliant Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for installation and authentification.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 8/7/XP (SP 3)/Vista (SP 2)
  • Processor: Intel Core® 2 Quad 2.4 Ghz or AMD Athlon II X4 2.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 8800GT / AMD ATI Radeon HD4830
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX 9.0 compliant Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for installation and authentification.
